titleStmt.author: Berners, Juliana, b. 1388?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Valentine Simmes] for Humfrey Lownes, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for large signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
"A treatise of hunting" and "The booke of armorie" each have separate dated title page naming Simmes as the printer; foliation and register are continuous.
Some copies have the illustration on leaf 57r cancelled.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
